_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: CODOU
author: dominique@wellisch-itservice.de
startup: ./coduo_lnxded +set net_port {{SERVER_PORT}} +set g_gametype tdm +map mp_hurtgen +set sv_maxclient 18 +set pb_sv_enable 1 +exec server.cfg

installation.script:
echo "Install COD1 debian linux" 

dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt-get update -y
apt-get install unzip git screen curl wget gcc-multilib g++-multilib -y
apt-get -y install libstdc++5:i386
apt-get -y install libmysqlclient-dev:i386

echo "### Downloading COD1 ###"
export HOME=/mnt/server
wget -P /mnt/server/ https://wellisch-itservice.de/cod1.zip
cd /mnt/server && unzip -o cod1.zip
cd /mnt/server && rm cod1.zip
